message: Mike? Nah, I'm Brian Bridley. I just saw no one else was using their real names, so I picked this one. Soz.
Donkey Kong Returns on Wii because I have a banana gun as Diddy
Are you Mike? If so, why Sage and then Xage??? Oh and I've heard that Vesperia isn't as great as Symphonia. True?
Also, they're lying. Vesperia is far superior, but Symphonia is great too.
Well, my favorite game of all-time is FFTactics, but the best one I've played recently is Tales of Vesperia. Psyched for Graces :D
Battlefield bad company 2 because I have 22 credits right now and when I get home I WANNA BLOW UP HELICOPTERS
lol, it's okay Catty, my favorite as a child was the Amazon Trail and I will still always love spearing fish and taking photos of Tapir :)
Been playing a lot of Galaga and getting a humour kick out of ATHF golf game
It's kind of lame, but Sonic Adventure 2 Battle will always hold a special place in my heart as my childhood all-time favorite. Otherwise I'd say Assassin's Creed because it's fun?
So don't feel nerdy :)
Assassins Creed 2 because I HAVE TO FIND THE TRUTH.  But I finished that Sunday night so Im revving up Eternal Sonata for a bit now, and then Im going to TRY to crank through Mass Effect.
Oregon Trail from a site I've used a couple times in the past http://www.myabandonware.com/game/oregon-trail-deluxe-1h9
Oh man Travis, have you met Peter Tri yet? He's in loooooove with BFBC2
Taiko no Tatsujin 2 & 3 for Wii.  Because I hate myself.  Also BFBC2, if only because there are no other decent, newer FPS games out right now for PC.
Starcraft obv. But I've been replaying all of the Half-life games recently. So epic. Nostalgia ftw.
OMFG World of Warcraft, but I can't afford the subscription
I have to agree sir.  Starcraft is a close 2nd for me and Half-Life IS epic
Is it possible to get number munchers/word munchers, oregon trail, or amazon trail on pc currently?
Planescape: Torment http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ixv_jRI6VqY
Mass Effect 2. There's so much depth. Powerful characters, strong plot, brilliant universe... it just ges on...
i really have to buy it for PC once i beat dead space 2
Starcraft 2 of course <3
Starcraft 2 or Go. It's pretty much constantly true.
Oh, and as far as why, it's pretty much because they're both awesome strategy games that novice players can beat AIs at if the AIs don't cheat.
PSSSSH AIs always cheat! What jerks...

This is not just brawny guy action game. Very emotional and touching, Deep thoughts, Voice acting is phenomenal,  Scary and also an adrenaline shot. This game got it ALL!!! From the EPIC Unreal Engine to the story and the right down to the BLOOD SPLATTER! This game REALLY has it ALL!
GEARS OF WAR....WOOOOT!!!!
Am I the only one voting for minecraft?

For sheer gore I would with God of War III.. Still epic in my mind.. Old school my greatest childhood achievement would be beating Ninja Gaiden II on the original NES.. Still stands to this today.. The final boss was crushing as far as difficulty comes.
Currently.. I'm going to go with Little Big Planet 2.. The short levels are a welcome diversion in between homework assignments..
MASS EFFECT 2.   I got to bang Garrus.  Nuff said.
marvel vs capcom 3. can't go wrong with the vs series
@Sage Awesome choice. I thought everyone was just RTS but I guess there is a few of TBS players out there too...
@kevinflo I love their commericials for their games. Haggard is so funny.

star ocean the second story: the battle system is different from most rpgs though not so different where it's a whole new genre, the story is compelling and the private actions and skill sets (outside of battle) really get to me :D
